name: bee-side
description:
Bee-Side is a free demo following Sunni who's determined to become an idol alongside her girlfriend, Bee. Help Sunni down the best path, whether it's becoming an idol herself or supporting Bee. There are currently 4 endings, with more planned in the future.

Updates:

The game will be updated with new content as it's finished, alongside bug fixes and any other additions. Bee-Side is a side short story to a full-length game I'm currently working on, Heart's Wish! While HW is my main focus, I still plan on making sure Bee-Side stays up-to-date and contains all the content that I've planned.

content to be included:

  • background music (first priority)
  • CGs throughout the game and for endings
  • more customized GUI/look
  • unfinished scenes
  • minor adjustments to already available content (new sprites, etc)

If you find an issue in the game, feel free to leave a comment and I'll be sure to include it in the next version update!

Please follow my twitter @monodygames for updates on Bee-Side and the upcoming Heart's Wish!

Thank you for checking out my game and I hope you enjoy this small game I've loved working on 💕
